DOC.brief_summary: The aim trial compare postprandial metabolic response glucose load healthy overweight type 2 diabetic subject , use glycemia , insulinemia , lipid profile , nutrient oxidation follow-up . Stable isotope glucose use assess postprandial total , exogenous endogenous glucose kinetics .
DOC.criteria: Overweight obese volunteer Healthy one group nd type 2 diabetic second group Age 30 65 year old Total cholesterol < = 7 mmol/l triglyceride < = 4 mmol/l For diabetic group : treat metformin and/or sulfonylurea and/or thiazolidinedione HbA1c < 6 % Stable weight last 3 month Informed consent No compliant subject Participation trial 2 month start one Ward court guardianship ( sheltered adult ) Person deprive freedom judicial administrative decision Type 1 diabetes type 2 diabetes treat bu insulin acarbose Existence previously diagnose pathology ( type 2 diabetes ) Previous gastrointestinal pathology Treated corticoid , anorexigens , weight loss medicine Alcoholism severe tobacco consumption
